CustomField.formula: IF(OR(Billing_Street__c <> '',Billing_City__c <> '',Billing_State__c <> '',Billing_Country__c <> '',Billing_Postal_Code__c <> '', Alternative_Invoice_Company_Name__c <> ''), IF(Alternative_Invoice_Company_Name__c <> '', Alternative_Invoice_Company_Name__c &BR(), '') & IF(Billing_Street__c <> '', Billing_Street__c &BR() , '') & IF(Billing_City__c<> '', Billing_City__c&BR(), '') & IF(Billing_State__c <> '', Billing_State__c&BR(), '') & IF(Billing_Postal_Code__c <> '', Billing_Postal_Code__c&BR(), '') & IF( Billing_Country__c <> '', Billing_Country__c, ''),'')
CustomField.label: Delivery Address
